data.name: XSheetCondition
desc: provides methods to access the settings of a condition in a conditional format or data validation.

methods.name: getFormula1
desc: returns either the comparison value, which is used in the condition, or the first value if two values are needed for the operator.

methods.name: getFormula2
desc: if two values are needed for the operator, this method returns the second one.

methods.name: getOperator
desc: returns the operator in the condition.

methods.name: getSourcePosition
desc: returns the position in the document which is used as a base for relative references in the formulas.

methods.name: setFormula1
desc: sets either the comparison value, which is used in the condition, or the first value if two values are needed for the operator.

methods.name: setFormula2
desc: if two values are needed for the operator, this method sets the second one.

methods.name: setOperator
desc: sets the operator in the condition.

methods.name: setSourcePosition
desc: sets the position in the document which is used as a base for relative references in the formulas.
